column4: so comparing to windows it would be some kind of enter mashine were I jjust write I want (apt-get)  yahoo messenger and it would download an install the package ?????
Not necessarily. Linux has other programs that will work like messenger, but you may not actually install the .exe file
It is possible in some cases to install WINE in Ubuntu and it can allow some windows executables to run under Ubuntu
